definition: sufficient to.../so much so that/so that
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)

sentences.english: It was easily good enough for pole so that was the main thing.
sentences.chinese: 那一圈跑得不錯，足以使我獲得杆位，那是最主要的。

sentences.english: Still, the brand was enough to energise its early hires.
sentences.chinese: 不過，這一品牌足以激勵公司早期的員工。

sentences.english: Love them enough to allow them to experience the consequences of their actions.
sentences.chinese: 愛他們足以讓他們感受到自己的行爲產生的後果。

sentences.english: One day is hardly enough to show our gratitude。
sentences.chinese: 僅這一天遠不足以表達我們對您的感激之情。

sentences.english: Long enough to become bored with them.
sentences.chinese: 一次就足以讓我膩煩了它。

sentences.english: But both Apple and Google have plenty of financial muscle to prolong the fight.
sentences.chinese: 但是，蘋果和谷歌兩家公司財力雄厚，足以打消耗戰。

sentences.english: That "if" is big enough to imply this is a battle lost.
sentences.chinese: 那個“如果”大得足以暗指這一次輸掉的戰役了。

sentences.english: The bird is small to winter jasmine, enough to see that they love for spring.
sentences.chinese: 鳥兒很小就來迎春，足以看出它們對春的喜愛。

sentences.english: You have earned enough merit to pass the imperial examinations.
sentences.chinese: 你們的福報足以使你們通過科舉考試。

sentences.english: Only old enough to be your father.
And rising bills are enough to make even the most bath-fond switch to showers.
sentences.chinese: 日益增加的水電費甚至足以令最愛缸浴的人改爲淋浴。

sentences.english: Whig opposition was not strong enough to defeat all the president's proposals.
sentences.chinese: 輝格黨的反對不足以阻止總統的所有的建議。

sentences.english: Even though the dukkha that manifests itself is ever so slight, it is enough to make us suspicious.
sentences.chinese: 儘管苦的表現如此細微，卻足以引起我們的懷疑。

sentences.english: He had a lot of eggs to sell, which would have made hebeloved anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 他有許多金蛋蛋要賣，足以使他到處受到歡迎的。

sentences.english: To hit this nowhere zilch town, and you can't?
sentences.chinese: 足以讓這個小鎮翻天覆地而你卻不能去？

sentences.english: Your wise decision can alter the destiny of abandoned animals.
sentences.chinese: 你一個明智的決定足以改變棄養動物的命運。

definition: enough (sufficient)/enough (too much)/(coll.) (before adj.) really/(coll.) to reach by stretching out
to be capable of/to be able to/can
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
